label.name: We designed an experiment here to decide what trea...
label.intro:
We designed an experiment here to decide what treatments you want to apply to particular plots in the first stage of the experiment. Upon filling out the interactive question, you should have had a data set downloaded which gives the data resulting from your experiment.


This section is on the analysis of this data. First, analyse your data using the appropriate software. Then, design the second stage of your experiment and obtain a set of simulated yields for this stage as before. To do this, you can access the quiz again below this question. Finally, analyse this second stage of the experiment.
